Factsheet

Pawsmonaut Games

Meridian: Frontier on Steam
Kickstarter Pre-Release:

Description

Meridian: Frontier is a story-driven 'lite-survival' base-building adventure game with a unique low-poly ¾ view style and deep, systemic gameplay. Explore a futuristic sci-fi underground world to mine and prospect for the valuable resources you need to build up your mining colony.

History

After leaving the AAA games industry, Alex's first project of his own always had to be a sci-fi survival game. Inspired both by classics like Lego Rock Raiders and modern survival gems like Subnautica, Meridian: Frontier is a love letter to story-driven singleplayer exploration, built around compelling physics-based gathering and base-building features.

Features

  • Stylised low-poly, high-fidelity graphics powered by Unreal Engine 5.
  • Mine and prospect for resources in a compelling, physics-based, futuristic sci-fi world.
  • Build up a mining colony - construct buildings and facilities, acquire new plans and decorate with extensive cosmetic options.
  • 'Lite-survival' gameplay. No food or drink to manage, but the planet is a hostile environment and it won't be easy to make your fortune.
  • Deep, story-driven exploration - follow in the boot-prints of a previous expedition and navigate a world of dystopian ultra-capitalism.
  • Riveting narrative and world-building driven by themes of corporate greed and the hope of a fresh start.
  • Mine, collect, prospect, refine and craft a huge amount of resources, items and tools.
  • Upgrade your tools and mining suit to unlock new abilities and improve your efficiency.
  • Fully voice-acted and featuring an original 'space-celtic' soundtrack.

About Pawsmonaut Games

Boilerplate
Pawsmonaut Games is a proud Scottish solo-indie game development studio, founded in 2023 to create deep, compelling experiences without micro-transactions, battle passes or predatory monetisation. We are currently working on our debut title, Meridian: Frontier.
